Parents, are you awake to gather your children with you into the fold? Are you making the salvation of Jesus Christ your first business? Do you 


                                     -226- 

educate and train your children to be obedient to you, their earthly father, that they may be obedient to God, their heavenly Father? This is your work --to leave nothing undone that you can do to cooperate with the Holy Spirit.
